Uses of Player in Controller
 

Methods in Controller with parameters of type Player
static void Controller.controller(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer: Controls the flow of the game and updates the GUI of the game
post-conditions: Rolls the Dice of the Player P1 and then updates his pawn and call the methods Position_Setup, end_turn, Sunday_Match.
static void Controller.end_turn(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer:Ends the turn of the player whose playing
post-condition:Calls the turn_Player and calls is_Finished if the Players have finished the game.
static void Controller.get_Loan(Player P1)
          Observer: Gives the Player a Loan of 1000 euros
post-conditions: Adds 1000 to the Loan and Money of the Player P1
static void Controller.is_Finished(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Sees who won the game and displays it (will be called when both players have finished the game)
post-condition: Checks which Player has the most Money after they pay their Loans and Displays the winner
static void Controller.MyDealCards(Player P1)
          Observer: Goes through the Players Deal Cards and Displays them.
static void Controller.Position_Setup(BoardGUI game, Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP)
          Observer: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player
post-condition: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player (Moves the Cards to the Players hand, finds his new MovePosition, updates the Players, infoBox and Jackpot, throws the Cards from the Players hand to the Pile)
static void Controller.Sunday_Match(Player P1)
          observer: Asks the player if he wants to bet for a football match if he wins it he gains 500 euros else he loses 500 euros (this method is called only when in certain positions on the board)
post-conditions: Asks the Player P1 if he wants to bet, if he wins he 500 are added to his Money if he loses 500 are removed from his Money
 

Uses of Player in Model.Card
 

Methods in Model.Card with parameters of type Player
 void Pay_The_Neighdor.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Charges the player P1 with an amount of money(Money_C)and gives it to the Player 2.
 void Move_to_Deal_Buyer.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Moves the Player P1 to the nearest Deal/Buyer position.
 void Mad_Money.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Charges the player P2 with an amount of money(Money_C), gives it to the Player P1.
 void Deal_Card.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer:Charges the Player with the amount of Money(Buy_Money) if he wants to Buy the card and gives it to the Player
post-condition: Removes the Buy_Money from Money of the Player and then moves the card to the Array DC of the Player
 void Charity.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Takes the amount of Money(Money_C) from the Player P1 and gives it to the Jackpot.
 void Card.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Does what the card says.
 void Bill.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Charges the player P1 with an amount of money(Money_C)and gives him the card
post-condition: The Money_C of the card is added to the Bill of the player P1 and then the card goes to the array BC of the player P1
 void Advertisement.get_card(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Shows the player an Advertisement card.
 

Uses of Player in Model.Player
 

Methods in Model.Player with parameters of type Player
static void Jackpot.add_Jackpot(Player P1, Player P2, int j)
          Observer: Adds the amount of Money(j) to the Jackpot
pre-condition: j > 0 post-condition: Removes the amount of Money(j) from the Money of the Player P1 and then puts it to the Jackpot
static void Dice.dice(Player P1)
          Observer: Rolls a dice and displays it
post-condition: Takes a random number from 1 to 6 and puts it to the dice of the player P1
static void Jackpot.win_Jackpot(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Gives the player P1 the Jackpot
post-condition: Adds the Jackpot to the Money of the Player P1 and then makes Jackpot 0
 

Uses of Player in Model.Position
 

Methods in Model.Position with parameters of type Player
 void Yard_Sale.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: The Player P1 rolls a dice and gives 100x(dice) to the bank, then takes the top Deal Card for free
post-condition: the Player P1 rolls the dice and removes 100x(dice) from his Money and then then moves the top Deal Card to his Cards
 void Sweepstakes.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Rolls a dice for the Player P1 and wins the number of the dice x 1000
post-condition: Rolls a dice for the Player P1 and adds 1000x(dice) to the Money of the Player P1
 void Radio_Contest.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Rolls a dice for both Players and whoever has the biggest number wins 1000, if both Players have the same number then they roll again
post-condition: Rolls a dice for both Players and the one with the biggest number adds 1000 to his Money, if both Players roll the same number then the roll again
 void Position.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Does what the position says.
 void PAY_DAY.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Gives the Player P1 2500 and balances his Bills and Loans, then checks if he has finished the game and then sets his position to 0 (if he still plays)
post-condition: Adds 2500 to the Money of Player P1, the balances his bills and Loans(and do all the necessary stuff for that) and then check if the player has any months left , if true then sets the position of the Player P1 to 0 ,else if false he sets the boolean is_finished of Player P1 to true if the Player has already Finished Rolls the dice and the dice is 4,5,6 the give 250 to the other Player
 void Mail_Position_2.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Draws 2 Message_Cards
post-condition: Draws 2 Message_Cards
 void Mail_Position_1.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Draws a Mail Card
post-condition: Draws a Mail Card
 void Lottery.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Asks the Players to chose a number from 1 to 6 and then rolls a dice, whoever guises correct then takes 1000 , if both wrong the rolls the dice again
post-condition: Asks the Players for a number from 1-6 ,then rolls a dice and whoever guises correct then 1000 are added to his Money , if both wrong then rolls dice again
 void Family_Casino_Night.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Checks the dice of the Player P1.If it is 1,3,4 then the Player gives 500 to the Jackpot, else if it is 2,4,6 then the Player gets 500
post-condition: If the dice of the Player P1 is 1,3,4 then 500 are removed from the Money the Player and added to the Jackpot , else if the dice is 2,4,6 then 500 are added to the Money of the Player
 void Deal_Position.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Draws a Deal Card
post-condition: Draws a Deal Card
 void Buyer.Perform_Action(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Asks the Player what Deal Card he wants to sell and then sells it.(removes it from the Player)
post-condition: Asks the Player what Deal Card he wants to sell then Adds the Sell_Money of the Deal card to the Money of the Player.
 

Uses of Player in View
 

Methods in View with parameters of type Player
 void BoardGUI.pawnForceMove(Player P1, int c)
          accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player in relation of his MovePosition
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player according to his MovePosition
 void BoardGUI.pawnmove(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player in relation with his dice
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player according with his dice
 void BoardGUI.pawnPayDay(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player to the PAY DAY Position
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player and sends it to the PAY DAY Position
 void BoardGUI.pawnreset(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player to the Start Position
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player and sends it to the Start of the Board
 void BoardGUI.turnPlayer(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Changes the Players turn on the frame
post-condition: Changes the visibility of the Players panel
 void BoardGUI.updateDice(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Updates the Players Dice on the info Box
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Dice on the info Box
 void BoardGUI.updateinfo(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Updates the info box (Month,turn,Dice)
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the info Box (Month,turn,Dice)
 void BoardGUI.updateJackpot(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Updates the Players Jackpot on the Board
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Jackpot on the Board
 void BoardGUI.updatePlayer(Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Updates the Players Stats (Money,Bill,Loan)
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Player (Money,Bill,Loan)
 void BoardGUI.updatePosition(Board BP, Player P1)
          accessor(selector): Updates the Players Position on the info Box
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Position info Box
 

Constructors in View with parameters of type Player
BoardGUI(Board BP, Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC)
          Constructor: Constructs a new Board frame and puts all the necessary Panels
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Board frame and puts in specific order all the Panels (background,logo,board,Player1,infobox,Player2) and all the Labels,images and text that go above them.
